root.name: Twisted Metal: Head-On
root.description: OverviewTwisted Metal: Head-On is a vehicular combat game and also part of the Twisted Metal series. Head-On is the first game in the series to go portable. The game is widely considered to be the true sequel to Twisted Metal 2, despite there already being a Twisted Metal III. The story is akin to its predecessors where a mysterious man named Calypso holds a tournament called Twisted Metal, where the victor is granted a single wish. The story continues the "be careful what you wish for" theme laid down by its predecessors where Calypso tends to twist the wish of the victor making them worse off than before.GameplayThe gameplay continues the traditional formula of its predecessors. Players use a variety of weapons such as bullets and missiles to destroy the vehicles of their opponents.
